Colors的值是RGB转换过来的，颜色是这么算的蓝色值+绿色值*256+红色值*65536，纯红色是值是16711680

255+2560+1310720=1313535


又比如1.13热带鱼的那个...
http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-786168-1-1.html
Variant = (PatternColor * 16777216) + (BaseColor * 65536) + (Pattern * 256) + Shape
PatternColor = 0-15
BaseColor = 0-15
Pattern = 0-5
Shape = 0-1复制代码https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=BxEUPAF6l7E&t=154s
